info.description:
API definition for eRS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[e-Referral Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description:
Profile : [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [Appointment](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Appointment.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

tags.name: ServiceRequest
tags.description:
Profile : [England-ServiceRequest](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-ServiceRequest.guide.md) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [ServiceRequest](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/ServiceRequest.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

 Resource type: [Task](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Task.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

Retrieve appointment slots](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir#api-Default-a015-retrieve-appointment-slots)"}],"searchParam":[{"name":"appointment-type","type":"token","documentation":"The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)"},{"name":"schedule.actor:HealthcareService","type":"reference","documentation":"A single service ID is required to indicate the service for which appointment slots are required."},{"name":"status","type":"token","documentation":"The free/busy status of the appointment"}]},{"type":"Questionnaire","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/NHSDigital-Questionnaire"},{"type":"QuestionnaireResponse","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/NHSDigital-QuestionnaireResponse","interaction":[{"extension":[{"url":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/Extension-NHSDigital-APIDefinition-OAS","extension":[{"url":"example","extension":[{"url":"request","valueBoolean":true},{"url":"value","valueReference":{"reference":"QuestionnaireResponse/d9d4cf80-3f9d-4435-9f3b-e6efb09ad654"}}]}]}],"code":"create","documentation":"Use this api to create a shortlist"},{"extension":[{"url":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/Extension-NHSDigital-APIDefinition-OAS","extension":[{"url":"example","extension":[{"url":"request","valueBoolean":false},{"url":"value","valueReference":{"reference":"QuestionnaireResponse/d9d4cf80-3f9d-4435-9f3b-e6efb09ad654"}}]}]}],"code":"read","documentation":"Use this api to retrieve a shortlist"}]},{"type":"HealthcareService","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/NHSDigital-HealthcareService","interaction":[{"code":"search-type","documentation":"[A010 - Patient service search](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir#api-Default-a010-patient-service-search)"},{"code":"read","documentation":"Unable to find existing matching service"}],"searchParam":[{"name":"service-type","type":"token","documentation":"The type of service provided by this healthcare service"},{"name":"identifier","type":"token","documentation":"Can't find this parameter presume need to: External identifiers for this item"}]},{"type":"DocumentReference","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/England-DocumentReference","documentation":"Used to index supporting information documents - documents themselves use Binary","interaction":[{"code":"read"}]},{"type":"List","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/England-DocumentReference","documentation":"To represent the short list of healthcare services for a referral"},{"type":"Binary","profile":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/StructureDefinition/NHSDigital-Binary","interaction":[{"code":"read","documentation":"[A006 - post.summary: create-type: Create a new Appointment instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing ServiceRequest instance, or create using a client-assigned ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
The patient identifier (e.g. NHS Number) that the service request is about Search on an identifier of the Patient, usualy NHS Number

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  ServiceRequest.subject.identifier.where(resolve() is Patient).identifier | ServiceRequest.subject.identifier.where(resolve() is Patient).where(resolve() is Resource).identifier |

parameters.name: _history
parameters.description:
Return the history of Task, the conversation. Special search parameter, see [FHIR Search](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html)

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [special ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#special)|  null |

Requesting additional advice, increasing.summary: Requesting additional advice, increasing priority (A+G Scenario Three)
Requesting additional advice, increasing.description: The Task.priority is increased to urgent.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: schedule.actor:HealthcareService
parameters.description:
A single service ID is required to indicate the service for which appointment slots are required. The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

 Chained search parameter. Please see [chained](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#chaining)

 | Name |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | schedule |  Slot.schedule | 


 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check HL7 FHIR conformance.**
